com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.service.impl

Class DeploymentServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.workflows.service.impl.DeploymentServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeploymentService

    public class DeploymentServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeploymentService
    This class represents a service to deploy all the existing process definitions, check if a workflow is deployed and to create and deploy process definitions for a batch class
    Version:
    $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on Oct 21, 2014
